name: Ultimate Runner (itch) (FlexDev)
description:
Hi, this is a game in which you need to run, get experience, coins, kill monsters, there is a store where you can buy other heroes for coins, there are settings, a loading screen, a cool menu.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

A game for the Windows platform !

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Character control:

1. Left - A   

2. Right - D  

3. Jump - Space

4. Back Flip - Pinch S 

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The game was created by the FlexDev team developer
